thread.title: Fantastic boutique hotel in Hell's Kitchen!
thread.title_full: Fantastic boutique hotel in Hell's Kitchen! - Review of 414 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Derek H
title: Fantastic boutique hotel in Hell's Kitchen!
text: We can't wait to go back! The staff was extremely hospitable and the evening cocktail hour just perfect! The rooms were clean and cozy and the location excellent! You may have to walk a few stairs to get to your room (there's no elevator) but it's great exercise and you'll have a cold drink waiting for you downstairs when you're finished unpacking!
